tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EmployeeLeaveRequest (
  employee_id INT NOT NULL,
  leave_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL,
  reason TEXT,
  status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE employees ( employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY, employee_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, department VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, position VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, join_date DATE NOT NULL, leave_balance INT NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE leave_requests ( request_id INT PRIMARY KEY, employee_id INT NOT NULL, request_date DATE NOT NULL, start_date DATE NOT NULL, end_date DATE NOT NULL, reason TEXT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE employee_leave_requests (
    employee_id INT NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    leave_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE leave_approvals (
    approval_id INT NOT NULL,
    request_id INT NOT NULL,
    approver_id INT NOT NULL,
    approval_date DATE NOT NULL,
    approved_status VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id INT NOT NULL,
    employee_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    job_title VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    department VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    supervisor_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE LeaveRequest (
    request_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    reason TEXT,
    status ENUM('pending', 'approved', 'rejected')
);
